item.title: Proxy container for Google Cloud Platofrm pubsub and datastore emulators.
item.description: NOTE: 12/30/19 : This article is very old; while it probably does run to some extent, i’m not sure if the tooling is still needed. I’ve removed this from GCP Blog to reduce some noise; i’m keeping it in my archive here…. Proxy server and container for GCP Cloud PubSub and Cloud Datastore emulators. In addition, the container runs an nginx HTTPS proxy infront of the PubSub|Datastore emulators so that even direct references to pubsub.
